entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API proposal]: System.CommandLine APIs #68578
  • Frequently hitting marshaling asserts while working on Corelib in VS #68572
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debugger tests run correctly but something is stuck and the tests never exit #68570
  • Dead code after switch over int64 influences result #68568
  • FileSystemEventArgs constructor throws with empty directory value #68566
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add back `ObsoletedInOSPlatformAttribute` for .NET 7 #68557
  • Consider moving UnspportOSPlatform on MD5 from the class to methods #68556
  • EnvelopedCms Decryption of binary data corrupts response on Linux if unencrypted data starts with byte value 0x04 #68554
  • OOME in RegexIgnoreCaseTests.Unicode_IgnoreCase_Tests on osx-arm64 #68545
  • What is the correct GC generation for static reference field in Net6? #68544
  • [wasm][debugger] Display parent's members on getProperties #68542
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix member type in static structures #68539
  • NativeAOT: Web App that uses "app.MapGet()" causes NullReferenceException during build #68538
  • Assertion failed '!"Instruction cannot be encoded: IF_LS_2B"' during 'Generate code' #68536
  • [API Proposal]: CollectionMarshal.AsSpan for a ReadOnlyCollection #68534
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.InternalBufferSizeTests.FileSystemWatcher_InternalBufferSize_SynchronizingObject #68532
  • ProxyTunnelRequest_OriginServerSendsProxyAuthChallenge_NoProxyAuthPerformed hung/slow #68531
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/VectorABI/VectorMgdMgdStatic_r/VectorMgdMgdStatic_r.sh #68530
  • gcstress=3 timeout failures #68529

Closed

  • Threadpool test CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster failing on Mac #66852
  • Determine from Host when HostedServices have completed / stopped working #58675
    Future
  • Test failure: Read_DataStoredAtDesiredOffset - CONNECTION_REFUSED #56613
    7.0.0
  • RegexSourceGenerator informational diagnostics are not being displayed on VS text editor nor on the console #68182
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Apply OpenTelemetry attribute limits to Activity #68528
    Future
  • Test failure System.PrivateUri.Tests.UriCreationOptionsTest.DisableCanonicalization_WorksWithDifferentSchemes #64889
    7.0.0
  • Why does Reflection lie? #68026
  • [iOS] Setting UmAlQura as a calendar culture results in a crash #68555
    6.0.x
  • Pkcs12Kdf can stack overflow with an exceptionally large password #68419
  • File.CreateAsSymbolicLink should throw if not able to create the symlink due to do not having permission #68525
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V1-M09.5-PDC\\b27657\\b27657\\b27657.cmd #64246
    7.0.0
  • Add LoongArch64 architecture port #59561
    Future
  • Test failure GC\\API\\Frozen\\Frozen\\Frozen.cmd #66569
    7.0.0
  • Backport Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open to 6.0 #67048
  • JIT: checked/release asm diff in windows and linux x64 #66155
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove an unnecessary assertion in tiering #68577
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Use `TempFile` in a test instead of `Path.GetTempFileName()` #68576
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1739550 #68575
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: add standard range enable for register stress #68574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix process not being killed #68573
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono, needs-author-action
  • Add a few more Regex timeout tests #68567
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm-mt] fix build config logic error, and pthread_getschedparam initialization #68563
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • Remove unwrapping of OCTET STRING wrapping in EnvelopedCms. #68562
    area-System.Security
  • Update arm/arm64 Linux cross build images #68561
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Adding the 2-parameter xplat shuffle helpers and accelerating them #68559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Build latest msquic locally in docker image #68558
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [eventpipe] Fix environment variable parser for multiple configurations #68552
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Rework unloadability fix #68550
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix VS complaining about missing projects in slns (continued) #68543
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce max shared memory object name length #68541
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT ARM32: Fix wrong emitAttr passed for loads/stores in PUTARG_STK #68540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix nullability for IEnumFORMATETC #68537
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution

Merged

  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add a test for ECDSA signatures at zero #68271
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fix createdump on Unix platforms that do not implement process_vm_readv #67544
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a thread pool test #67399
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Update RegexGenerator message for LimitedSourceGenerationMessage #68569
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono] merge wasm-threading-eventpipe into main #68232
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove hash work in RsaPaddingProcessor.OpenProcessor. #68553
    area-System.Security
  • Tweak RegexGenerator scan loop #68560
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow custom IExternalScopeProvider in LoggerFactory via DI #67520
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Extend stress timeouts for merged tests #68523
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow port 65535 in UriParser.Register #68546
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary/erroneous initialization to base.Crawlpos() #68549
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Update diagnostic titles to use localized strings #68533
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Use checked arithmetic to prevent stack overflow in Pkcs12Kdf #68422
    area-System.Security
  • Decouple call store operands from local ret buf optimization #68469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Get rid of last mentions of DllImportGenerator #68535
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Fix leaks after unsuccessful assembly load (another try) #68502
    NO-MERGE, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Run illink before ApiCompat #66706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework

Updated

  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add ValueTask pooling in more places #68457
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [wasm][debugger] Rebind invalid breakpoints after receiving an update in that source file #64462
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add support for parsing Unified TLS hello #68425
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add DI spec tests for scope factory singleton, hierarchical scopes #68517
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Stop IHostedService instances asynchronously by default #68216
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Remove stores as operands of calls in LIR #68460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0] Backport test fixes #68332
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Reduce leaked test files #68522
    area-System.IO
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove usage of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr
  • avoid Reflection in Quic #68189
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fixing API compat issues between ref/src for attributes on properties #68432
    breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/6.0] Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move reflection based converter and contract resolution logic to DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver #68496
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Delete `CLS_VAR` #68524
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Assign PropertyCache after it's configured for source gen in attempt to fix JSON LookupProperty assert failing #68480
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    community-contribution
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Refactor of getProperties mechanism #68486
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Always set `IND_NONFAULTING` for not-null addresses #68518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes #41234 (#41376) #68500
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • skip the test when dotnet.exe is locked #66196
    area-System.IO, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Do not reset assigned interval twice #68327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Figure out why two first run message tests were failing on Ubuntu 20.04 #25086
    Backlog
  • donnet 3.1 seems broken on last openSUSE Tumbleweed #25069
  • Add command to print the RID of the .NET SDK. #25065
  • Process.Start() is not supported on Windows in dotnet SDK 6.0.202 #25063
  • `RuntimeIdentifier` in project is not respected when building/publishing as self-contained #25062
    6.0.4xx

Closed

  • Cannot exit while running an uninstalled dotnet tool #22749

PullRequests

Created

  • Port changes from Main for fixing binary version issues. #25087
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a test for native lib #25060
    Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Update the lock file to a newer version to see if that helps. #25081
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Lingering use of System.Private.Uri v.old #25021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.400 #25050
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #24952
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow file changes from tar as it's just a warning #24971
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Next helix test move #25057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ubuntu version #24650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change tests to target 4.6.2 instead of 4.6.1 #25056
    Area-Infrastructure
  • update exception message for invalid rollback file #24973
    Area-Workloads
  • Assign names to arguments for nuget commands #25001
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Update the netcoreapp2.1 and netcoreapp2.2 to the current framework #25039
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Created

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Semantic Snippets Update Tests #60969
    Next
  • Test plan for "Default Interface Implementation of static members" feature #60968
  • Test plan for RelaxingShiftOperator feature #60967
  • Source generators: projectreference #60964
  • VB implement abstract class adds NullableAttributes #60963
  • Option insert_final_newline does not have IDE specified default value #60962
  • StackOverflow when building a core-assembly. #60961
  • Wrong compiler warning reported for target-typed new under collection initilizer #60960
  • Allow overriding an analyzer's opt-out of analyzing generated source code #60958
  • note: teh CT being in FixAllContext was somewhat a mistake #60957
  • Revert FixAll support for Invert conditional refactoring #60956
    17.3
  • Update and move readme of CodeCleanup #60954
  • Compile Warning(18744): File access preemption #60953

Closed

  • "Convert to raw string" fixer which removes indentation and initial blank line from the string value #59591
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete unused RPC streaming code from our OOP impl. #60974
    Area-IDE
  • Don't initialize the StackTraceExplorer tool window until it is invoked #60973
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 'main' into RelaxingShiftOperator #60972
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Allow non-Roslyn languages to use Formatter API #60971
    Area-IDE
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #60970
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Simplify implementation of the "remove 'this' or 'me'" analyzer/fixer. #60966
    Area-IDE
  • Enable declaration, implementation(in non-interfaces) and consumption of virtual static members. #60965
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces

Merged

  • Relax requirements around second parameter of a user-defined shift operator. #60717
    Area-Compilers
  • Update details on "numeric IntPtr" #60722
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60797
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60798
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update 'convert to raw string' to help cleanup strings with leading whitespace #60936
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Formatting options fallback and Document extensions #60803
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Rename `CodeStyleHostLanguageServices.cs.cs` to `CodeStyleHostLanguageServices.cs` #60955
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove non-servicing branches from our PublishData #60947
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #60951
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Allow VSMac to access LSP options #60943
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60952
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Move the load of project completion providers to background #60950
    Area-IDE
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Forbid types with required members from substituting for where T : new() #60788
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Use ExpeditedDelay in with our features that pause while non-visible #60608
    Area-IDE
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings (approach #2) #60906
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add EA layer for ASP.NET Core. #60948
    Area-IDE
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OpenIdConnect Access Token Claims #41385
  • Endpoint metadata is not discovered from return types implementing IEndpointMetadataProvider if the method is async #41384
    7.0-preview4
  • IResult types don't throw ArgumentNullException for parameters declared as non-nullable reference types on Execute and PopulateMetadata methods #41383
    7.0-preview5
  • .NET 6 application sometimes loading incorrect appsettings.{environment}.json #41381
  • SignalR: Content-Type header in GET requests #41378
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Different Behavior during ASPNET Core upgrade (MSI install vs Windows Update install) #41377
  • Remove allocation in ValueTask<object> response processing path #41376
    7.0-preview5

Closed

  • Windows runtime installer contains .NET Framework EULA #40835
    7.0-preview5
  • ContentRootPath normalization / DataProtection Discriminator #40964
    7.0-preview5
  • Route handler filters don't handle all return types #41213
    7.0-preview4
  • Change 'http' to 'https' in the HttpRequestsComponent.razor example #41346
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #41351
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, connectionclosehttps #41352
  • Diagnosing production performance issues - missing PUT requests #41187

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix discovery of endpoint metadata from async route handlers #41386
    area-runtime
  • Fix MapPath and UsePathBase's use of implicit PathStrings #41382
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Remove allocations in ValueTask<object> and Task<object> codepaths #41379
    area-web-frameworks
  • Determine next log file number from directory on first run #41375
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable trimming for middleware and friends #41373
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Use MIT license for Installer EULA #41286
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • [release/7.0-preview4] Add MapGroup #41367
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4
  • Change http to https in HttpRequestsComponent.razor example (#41346) #41374
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Update RequestDelegateFactory.cs #41371
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5
  • Support all return types from handler in filters #41372
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5
  • Support all return types from handler in filters #41310
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks

Updated

  • Debug `dotnet restore` problems #41331
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR] Update some npm deps #41270
    area-signalr
  • [release/6.0] Fix diff checks for ContentRoot and WebRoot #41182
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure
  • Dispose httpclient in IIS tests #41283
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #41158
    blocked, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • release/6.0 port of abort handling #41360
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Allow HttpSys zero-byte reads #41305 #41332
    area-runtime
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure all tools properly surface connect and listen semantics for diagnostic ports #3033
    .NET 7.0
  • The "setsymbolserver -ms" added to the .lldbinit by dotnet-sos fails #3032
    .NET 7.0

Closed

PullRequests

Created

  • use viewport-relative coordinates #3034

Updated

  • Write temp files to tempdir #3031
    bug, dotnet-stack

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BinarySerialization for MAUI cannot be used on Android #6520
  • The Shell FlyoutItems didn't appear when the app is in dark theme #6519
  • CollectionView Crash on Android... RequestBuilder Error #6518
  • ListView GroupHeader background color not rendering correctly on iOS #6515
  • Windows DisplayActionSheet vertical layout is set to fill instead of center #6508
    6.0.300
  • [MacCatalyst] Lifecycle events don't trigger for minimizing and locking device #6507
  • The UmAlQura calendar is getting crashed. #6505
  • RC1 - App crash when FilePicker selects large files #6503
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Ability to record audio into a stream #6502
    Future
  • AbsoluteLayout not always setting child position and size as requested. #6500
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] ScrollView's ContentSize and ScrollX changes when the device is rotated multiple times #6499
    6.0.300
  • Talkback is not announcing the numbering for the list items and not announcing "Out of List" when the focus moves out of the list items. #6498
    6.0.300-servicing
  • the following workloads must be installed: maccatalyst #6496
    .NET 7

Closed

  • [mauipalooza] Button background doesn't render gradient #5950
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [mauipalooza] CornerRadius not working on Button #5930
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Unable to open dev tools in Windows Application. #6510
  • [mauipalooza] Border doesn't contain or wrap image #5928
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Border content alignment not centered on Windows #3471
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • MAUI Blazor template (WinUI 3) does not display WebView2 Runtime download link #6421
    6.0.300
  • Clearing and readding views to a layout results in no views being displayed #6179
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android] Wrong size and layout issues using Line, Polygon, Polyline and Path #4051
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Line (horizontal or vertical) does not show #6204
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Not rendering Line without setting Height and Width #4044
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [iOS] Calling VisualDiagnostics.RenderAs for Window causes Exception #5693
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bring DefaultRenderer concept to .NET MAUI #3594
    .NET 7
  • Context menu on wrong position in Windows, crashes in Android #6155
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • After installing .NET 7 preview everything MAUI related disappears #6396
  • Get xplat element from native view #3530
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException - NaN is not a valid value for width #6168
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • iOS Background (Remote) Notification Functionality Absent (Since Preview 12) #6259
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • PreferencesImplementation is inaccessable due to its protection level #6436
    6.0.300
  • Setting BackgroundColor from code doesn't do anything for Shapes #5974
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • (dotnet publisch ios) Unable to authenticate using the following authentication method: KeyboardInteractiveAuthenticationMethod / Invalid Bundle. #5632
    6.0.300
  • Ios Local device component css failing to load #5245
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix MAUI Blazor crash for multi-window Windows apps #6516
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
  • [WinUI] NavigationView fixing margins and corner radius #6513
  • Move colors into separate file #6511
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks from 7.0.100-preview.2.22102.8 to 7.0.100-preview.5.22226.1 #6506
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Clean up the windows code a bit #6501
    platform/windows 🪟, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] MenuBarItems are now rendered when Shell.Title is not set #6497
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢

Merged

  • [Android] Fix issues rendering gradients and CornerRadius on Button #5971
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Windows] Fix Border content position and clipping #6472
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix WebView2 Runtime download link for Blazor MAUI #6492
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Bump System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe from 4.7.1 to 6.0.0 #6354
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Rendering Shapes without explicit bounds. #5817
    area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Fix theme and NRE on Android and Fix Icons on WinUI #6491
    t/bug, area/ListView, 6.0.300-rc.3

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add OnModelCreating(ModelBuilder modelBuilder, bool designTime) overload #27891
  • Unreliable DateTime comparison in `WHERE` clause #27889
  • Owned types in table per hierarchy cause duplicate rowversion column in query that then throws system exception #27888

Closed

  • Support file-scoped namespace declarations in generated .cs files #25223
  • EF Core throws Exception when saving changes to objects that were included with `.Include()` #27890
  • Remove unnecessary extra batches in SaveChanges #20664
    7.0.0
  • Global API to turn off code generation if Table has triggers and optimization in code generation #27879
  • Scaffolding option to specify a class suffix #27887
  • Consider delaying DbCommandInterceptor.CommandCreated until DbCommand properties are intialized #17261
    7.0.0-preview5
  • UninitializedDbSetDiagnosticSuppressor doesn't work when a constructor is present #26879
    7.0.0
  • LINQ : Select top distinct from group order by creationTime #27839

PullRequests

Merged

  • Reduce SaveChanges roundtrips #27713
    auto-merge
  • Add CommandInitialized interceptor #27884
  • Suppress uninitialized DbSet warnings when a ctor is present #27869

Updated

  • [6.0.x] Return null constraint names for keys and FKs on entity types not mapped to a table. #27857
    Servicing-consider

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update the download page for 6.0.400 and remove 6.0.200 #13701

Merged

  • Update Versions.props #13700
  • Update branding to 6.0.400 non-stable #13695
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #13678

Updated

  • Add Mariner 2.0 and Arm64 RHEL builds (6.0.3xx) #13640
